long_description: The INNO Stream 15 Cargo roof box offers plenty of space in a short profile, making it a great choice for wagons and small SUVs with rear hatch openings. Universal mounting hardware mounts to square, round and most factory crossbars. Ample 15 cubic foot capacity can handle 4 snowboards. Dual side opening for easy loading; user friendly locking mechanism for single handed opening. 2-layer ABS construction; includes locks and keys; matte black finish. Safety lock system ensures the box is always locked-keys can only be removed when the box is closed and locked.
short_description: The INNO Stream 15 Cargo roof box offers plenty of space in a short profile, making it a great choice for wagons and small SUVs with rear hatch openings.
